name: Icresset
description: iCresset is a Boutique Talent Solutions firm managed by team of Professionals from IIMs with extensive cross functional experience across Target industries. We provide holistic solutions towards discovering, selecting, hiring and retaining Senior Executive Talent for our clients. To be THE Most Favored Destination in India for Companies & Candidates Towards Discovering, Selecting, Hiring and Retaining Executive Talent in Pharma, Agribusiness, IT/ITes, Automotive and allied sectors.
features: Talent Assessment - Prevue HR Total Person Assessment
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Executive Search Firm Led By Thought Leaders. Expertise in Agribusiness, FMCG, Life Sciences, Industrial, and IT.
ShortDescription: iCresset is a Boutique Talent Solutions firm managed by team of Professionals from IIMs with extensive cross functional experience across Target industries.

Highlights.name: Leadership Hiring Specialists
Highlights.description: iCresset Talent Solutions is a recruitment firm that specializes in leadership hiring . This means that they can help businesses find the qualified executives they need to fill their most important leadership positions.

Highlights.name: Scientific Approach to Talent Acquisition
Highlights.description: iCresset uses a scientific approach to talent acquisition . This means that they use data and analytics to identify the best candidates for the job. This is in contrast to traditional recruitment methods, which may rely more on gut feeling or intuition.

Highlights.name: Industry-Knowledgeable Team
Highlights.description: iCresset has a team of domain advisors with industry knowledge . This means that they have a deep understanding of the specific needs and challenges of different industries. This can be helpful for businesses looking to find executives who are a good fit for their company culture

enhanced_description: iCresset is a boutique talent solutions firm specializing in holistic executive search and talent acquisition. Managed by professionals with extensive cross-functional and industry experience, iCresset focuses on discovering, selecting, hiring, and retaining senior executive talent. They employ a scientific approach to talent acquisition, leveraging tools like the Prevue HR Total Person Assessment, to identify the best candidates and boost hiring manager confidence. Based in Gurgaon, Haryana, iCresset aims to be a leading destination in India for companies and candidates in sectors such as Pharma, Agribusiness, IT/ITes, Automotive, FMCG, Life Sciences, Industrial, Specialty Chemicals, Education, Social Sector, and Business & Professional Services.
competitive_advantages: Team of Professionals from IIMs (high-level management expertise)
Extensive cross-functional experience across target industries
Holistic solutions for executive talent lifecycle (discovery, selection, hiring, retention)
Scientific Approach to Talent Acquisition (data and analytics-driven)
Leverages Prevue HR Total Person Assessment for talent assessment
Industry-Knowledgeable Team / Domain Advisors (deep understanding of specific industry needs)
roi_benefits: Identify best candidates for the job
Find qualified executives for important leadership positions
Help businesses find executives who are a good fit for their company culture
